changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_topic_seq; create type ecampaigntopictype as enum ('PROBLEM', 'SOLUTION', 'RISK_AND_COMPETITION', 'CAPITAL_AND_EXIT', 'UPDATES', 'OVERVIEW'); create table if not exists campaign_topic ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_topic_pkey primary key, content varchar(255), type ecampaigntopictype, campaign_id bigint constraint campaign_topic_fk_on_campaign references campaign, constraint campaign_topic_uk_on_type_and_campaignId unique (type, campaign_id) );
